windows.title: Hey Niklas, anything blocking you from enabling CoPilot? - firat.gomi@trilogy.com - DevFactory Mail - Pinned - High memory usage - 1.7 GB - Google Chrome - Firat (trilogy.com)

uiElements.details: Email interface with navigation panel on the left, main content in the center, and a smaller panel on the right for additional options and settings.

content.title: Email Content
content.layoutDescription: Email displayed in the center with a navigation sidebar on the left and a smaller sidebar on the right.
content.visibleText:
Firat Gomi <firat.gomi@ignitetech.com> to niklas.hogstedt
Hello Niklas,

This is Firat, Product Manager of Jive. Hope that all is well!

I wanted to reach you personally because I've seen that you have not yet enabled CoPilot. I understand that Fenegro has disabled CoPilot, and I wanted to reach out personally to understand your experience.

As the Product Manager of Jive, I'd like to address your concerns directly. Can we have a chat? https://calendly.com/firat-jive/meeting

You can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email. If you weren't aware of the CoPilot launch yet, you can check here for more information: [link to information about CoPilot]

Besides these, let me know if I can help you in any way. I'd love to create a connection and help you improve other areas as well.

Best regards,
Firat

Firat Gomi | Product Manager | IGNITECH
IgniteTech.com

content.title: Email Content
content.visibleText:
Hello Niklas,

This is Firat, Product Manager of Jive. Hope that all is well!

I wanted to reach you personally because I've seen that you have mentioned that you'd like to start trials with CoPilot during the renewal calls.

As the Product Manager of Jive, I'd like to address your concerns and see if we can arrange a chat? https://calendly.com/firat-jive/meeting

You can also just shoot me your thoughts as a reply to this email.

If you weren't aware of the CoPilot launch yet, you can check this out: [link to CoPilot information]

Besides these, let me know if I can help you in any way. I'd love to hear from you.

Best regards,
Firat

--
Firat Gomi | Product Manager
IgniteTech.com
